meanings.definition: A device for watering lawns or gardens by sprinkling water.
meanings.sent1: The sprinkler in the garden helps keep the plants hydrated.
meanings.sent2: I turned on the sprinkler to water the dry lawn.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel danced under the sprinkler, enjoying the cool water.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the garden as she ran through the sprinkler.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the sprinkler spraying water was soothing.

meanings.definition: A person who sprinkles something, such as salt or water.
meanings.sent1: The baker is the sprinkler of sugar on top of the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The chef is known as the master sprinkler of seasonings in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The sprinkler of glitter at the party made everything sparkle.
meanings.sent4: She was like a sprinkler of joy, spreading happiness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The sprinkler of compliments always made people feel good about themselves.

meanings.definition: A system of pipes and nozzles used for fire protection.
meanings.sent1: The building had a state-of-the-art sprinkler system for fire safety.
meanings.sent2: The sprinkler system activated as soon as the smoke alarm went off.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy firefighter accidentally set off the sprinkler system during training.
meanings.sent4: In case of a fire, the sprinkler system will automatically release water to extinguish it.
meanings.sent5: The maintenance crew regularly checks the sprinkler system to ensure it functions properly.
